JobFullDesc: About the roleDid you know that Uber is far more than just a ride across town, or food from your favorite restaurant? Uber is also a growing logistics partner for the freight industry - and their SEO team is hiring.  This person will work with a cross-functional team across product, marketing, sales and engineering to develop and optimize an experience that supports the growth of our B2B freight business.  Responsibilities* Participate on the front-lines, leading complex cross-functional content development and web optimization projects.* Lead the web roadmap planning process for Uber Freight, with strategically outlined projects and initiatives, supported by quantitative forecasts.* Develop compelling and differentiated content to reveal Uber Freight’s product value to prospective customers. Source content that drives SEO traffic and lead generation.* Work with the Uber Global SEO team to conduct keyword and competitive research, optimize the website for SEO to increase rankings, inbound links, and organic traffic.* Own and drive web KPIs for the Uber Freight business.* Establish a shared SEO vision across company stakeholders by building consensus on priorities leading to successful content experiments.* Partner with international and multidisciplinary teams like Data Analytics , Regional Marketing and Product to identify and act on growth opportunities.* Understand Uber’s evolving strategic and competitive position and deliver content strategies that are recognized as best in the industry.  What the Candidate Will Need / Bonus Points Basic QualificationsMinimum of 3+ years of experience Bachelor's degree required Preferred QualificationsExperience with SQL, Tableau, or similar business intelligence toolsExperience in product strategy and developmentEntrepreneurial experienceSpeak multiple languages 4+years of in-house experience with SEO Content within an international web business, driving projects from idea to implementationDeep knowledge of SEO Content creation and experience working with sites that have multiple locales and languagesProven track record of driving execution with examples of successful content optimization projects.A creative and data-driven mindset, with a natural ability to challenge status quoEase QA and understanding of localised copy and contentA hard-working, detail-oriented, organized, and motivated self-starter, constantly striving to improve your skills and look for ways to add value to the team
